titleStmt.title: Animadversions on a petition delivered to the honourable House of Parliament by several of the godly party in the county of Salop in vindication of the present government of the commonwealth, the prudent conduct of the army, and the liberties of the people / by R.F.
titleStmt.author: Flecknoe, Richard, d. 1678?

notesStmt.note: Written by Richard Flecknoe. Cf. Wing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
